content: DX 600-N Powder-actuated tool Powder-actuated nailer for fastening threaded stud to concrete and steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features A quicker, easier way to make permanent or temporary fastenings using threaded studs Virtually vibration-free solution for creating threaded fastening points in concrete â€“ no drilling required for these powder-actuated fastenings Applications Fastening threaded studs to concrete and steel for hanging sprinkler pipe systems and other similar applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fastener Intake: Single Fastener length range: 0.59 - 1.65 in Cartridge type: .27 caliber long single Technical Data | Weight | 10.9 lb | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.59 - 1.65 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber long single | Automatic piston return | No | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 528 J | Power regulation | No | Piston type | 6N/DS ### ITEMS- 3521171 - KIT 600N+W10-30-27+6.8/18 BLACK (5K) - Package Size 1 pc - 6059 - Powder-actuated tool DX 600-N WH - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 600-N Powder-actuated tool - 1x SPARES PACK DX 600N (REPAIR PART) - 1x POWDER ACTUATED TOOL CLEANING KIT - 1x Sleeve - 1x DX 600 Tool case assy
